price: Ili iwe ni riziki kwa waja wangu. Na tukaifufua kwa maji nchi iliyo kuwa imekufa. Kama hivyo ndivyo utakavyo kuwa ufufuaji.
arabic: رِّزۡقٗا لِّلۡعِبَادِۖ وَأَحۡيَيۡنَا بِهِۦ بَلۡدَةٗ مَّيۡتٗاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡخُرُوجُ
footnotes: Tumeotesha hiyo ili iwe ni riziki kwa waja wetu, na tukaihuisha kwa maji ardhi iliyo kauka mimea yake. Hali kadhaalika ndivyo kufufuliwa wafu kutoka makaburini.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: riz'qan lil'ʿibādi wa-aḥyaynā bihi baldatan maytan kadhālika al-khurūju
